mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO (USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, ADDR1, ADDR2, REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{email}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{userId}, NOW(), #{userId}, NOW())

INSERT INTO USER_RANK (USER_ID, USER_NAME, POINTS, DISTANCE, CARBON_SAVED, LEVEL, ACHIEVEMENTS, CHALLENGES, AVATAR, CREATED_AT) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, IFNULL(#{points}, 0), IFNULL(#{distance}, 0), IFNULL(#{carbonSaved}, 0), IFNULL(#{level}, 1), IFNULL(#{achievements}, 0), IFNULL(#{challenges}, 0), IFNULL(#{avatar}, '?'), NOW())
